General.Name: Bank Ganesha Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Bank Ganesha Tbk provides various general banking products and services for individuals and businesses in Indonesia. The company operates through Banking, Consumer, Treasury, and Others segments. It accepts savings, current, and time deposits. The company also provides personal, fixed income, car, housing, working capital, and investment loans. In addition, it offers safe deposit boxes, bank guarantees, debit and credit cards, and e-statements; automated teller machine and CRM, remittance, phone and electricity bill payment, tax payment, export/import, and other banking services; mutual funds, mobile and internet banking services; and bancassurance products. PT Bank Ganesha Tbk was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
